personal.title: Front-End Developer
personal.description: Front-end developer with 4+ years of experience building responsive, high-performance web applications using React.js and Next.js. Skilled in translating UI/UX designs into pixel-perfect interfaces, optimizing for speed and scalability, and collaborating effectively in Agile teams. I write clean, maintainable code and take ownership from development through deployment.

skills.name: JavaScript / TypeScript
skills.description: ES6+, TypeScript for building dynamic, type-safe web applications

skills.description: Component-based UI development, Redux state management, reusable component libraries

skills.name: Next.js
skills.description: SSR, SSG, API routes, dynamic routing, and optimized full-stack React applications

skills.name: HTML5 / CSS3
skills.description: Semantic markup, responsive layouts, CSS preprocessors (SASS), animations, cross-browser compatibility

skills.name: Node.js
skills.description: Backend development, RESTful API integration, build tooling (Vite, Webpack)

skills.name: Cocos Creator
skills.description: Interactive web experiences, animations, and cross-platform applications

experience.summary: Developing modern web applications with React.js and Next.js, focusing on performance optimization and seamless API integration in an Agile environment.
